item.title: H.R. 4943 - Clarifying Lawful Overseas Use of Data Act or CLOUD ACT
item.description: Published: February 2018 URL: https://www.congress.gov/bill/115th-congress/house-bill/4943 Abstract: Summary of H.R.4943 - 115th Congress (2017-2018): CLOUD Act

item.title: Promoting Public Saftey, Privacy, and the Rule of Law Around the World: The Purpose and Impact of the CLOUD Act
S.2889 - National Security and Personal Data Protection Act of 2019
item.description: Published: November 2019 Abstract: To safeguard data of Americans from foreign governments that pose risks to national security by imposing data security requirements and strengthening review of foreign investments, and for other purposes.
